name: EMERGENCY QUEEN
description:
(demo represents project still in development)

CONTROLLER REQUIRED! Mouse and keyboard is not supported at this time.

Just extract and run. Controls are explained in-game.

Also available is a quirky little bonus room where you play an early concept for the game that would become Emergency Queen.

Thanks for playing!

CREDITS - SLOWED MINDS

Enemy design: Rich Diaz
